1.Extract the downloaded file using winrar or any other
2.Again extract the downloaded file
3.Download daemontool from filehippo.com or anyother site to make virtual drive
4.Attach the image in the extracted folder to make a virtual drive
5.Install the game and directx( which will prompt u automatically)
6.Open the virual using right mouse button..
7.Copy the files in crack and replace it with installed directory
8.It will work and running successfully for me
